typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		FUND_ID as string,
		ASSET_ID as string,
		VERSION_NAME as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'SELECT DISTINCT FUND_ID, ASSET_ID, VERSION_NAME FROM [staging].[COA_Budgets]',
	format: 'query') ~> StagingDB
StagingDB select(mapColumn(
		FUND_ID,
		ASSET_ID,
		VERSION_NAME
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectOutput
SelectOutput alterRow(deleteIf(true())) ~> AlterRowDelete
AlterRowDelete sink(input(
		Budget_ID as long,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Asset_ID as string,
		GL_Code as string,
		Cash_Flow_Code as string,
		Version_Name as string,
		Debit_Credit as string,
		Budget_Type as string,
		Budget_Date as timestamp,
		Budget_Desc as string,
		Budget_value as decimal(18,2),
		Update_datetime as timestamp,
		record_deleted_flag as integer,
		process_name as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:true,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	keys:['Fund_ID','Asset_ID','Version_Name'],
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		Fund_ID = FUND_ID,
		Asset_ID = ASSET_ID,
		Version_Name = VERSION_NAME
	)) ~> DeleteRecords
